entries.name: Properties
entries: Forging Conditions: Must be forged by Modrons.

Armor Effects: You have advantage on saving throws that would magically move you against your will, including teleportation and planar warping spells. You are considered a Construct while wearing this armor.
Weapon Effects: Weapons cannot roll with disadvantage or advantage.

Additional Effects: Clockwork Bronze Tinkerer's Tool can be used to mend Constructs. As an action you can restore a number of hit points to a construct equal to the Construct's number of hit dice + your proficiency bonus. This consumes one hit die from the construct.
